description:
Cozy and comfortable studio apartment in the heart of historic Chinatown/Little Italy/Tribeca

The apartment is located on the second floor of a 1900 walk up building. The apartment is very well kept, cozy, and clean with lots of natural sunlight and view on historical Mulberry Street. all charming characteristics of life in NYC :)

Guest have access to the entire apt and all its amenities!

You can reach me at any time with any questions or concerns. I also will gladly leave you a list of some of my favorite spots in the city and in my neighborhood but surely you can't go wrong in this area!3

Little Italy is a neighborhood in lower Manhattan, once known for its large population of Italians (and mafia). It is bounded on the west by Tribeca and Soho, on the south by Chinatown, on the east by the Bowery and Lower East Side, and on the north by Nolita. SOHO

The apartment is conveniently located near all of the major subways lines (ACE line, NQR line, 6 line, BD line, and JZ line). You also can walk pretty much anywhere in the downtown area from here and if you wish there are plenty of taxi that can be taken at any time.

FOR ALL CHECKIN'S AFTER 10:00PM OR 22:00PM THEIR WOULD BE A $30 FEE DUE AT CHECK-IN
name: COZY STUDIO IN THE HEART OF NYC!!
review: Our stay at Milan's was perfect. The apartment was very quiet and clean. Plenty of space for two people- more spacious than a hotel room as well. Milan was very accommodating, he met us outside of the apartment and even helped us find street parking. Milan was a pleasure to work with and I would recommend his apartment to anyone thinking of going to the city.
